html:
** Shares of British asset manager ABDN.L up 2.6% at 262.5 pence, second top gainer on UK's blue-chip index .FTSE

** Stock on track for highest one-day pct gain since Sept. 22

** Co confirms discussions with J.C. Flowers & Co regarding potential acquisition of Interactive Investor

** There can be no certainty that these discussions will result in a transaction - co

** Sky News on Saturday reported ABDN was in advanced talks to buy the online investment service for more than 1.5 bln pounds ($2.02 bln) (Full Story)

** Analysts at Keefe, Bruyette & Woods expect the transaction's rationale would be to access Interactive Investor's growing retail customer base, to cross-sell products

** Including Monday sessions gains, ABDN has fallen ~7% YTD



($1 = 0.7414 pounds)


(Reporting by Priyanshi Mandhan in Bengaluru)
